translation.en: [woman 1] Tight knees, tight knees.

translation.it: Iniziai a fare ginnastica a tre anni

translation.en: because I was always climbing out of my crib
translation.it: perché scendevo dal mio lettino scavalcandolo

translation.it: i miei mi misero in un ambiente più sicuro

translation.it: Così, quando dopo tre maschi ebbi una bambina, gliela feci fare.

translation.en: So, yes, as a preschooler.

translation.it: L'accolsero da bambina, tipo in seconda elementare.

translation.en: I mean, she was the only ten-year-old in the country that competed at Nationals.
translation.it: Fu l'unica bambina di dieci anni a gareggiare alle nazionali.

translation.en: [man] You know, somebody drove her to the gym, maybe 45 minutes from here.
translation.it: L'accompagnavamo in palestra, a circa 45 minuti di macchina da qui.

translation.en: Come back, maybe go back to work,

translation.en: pick up Maggie at the gym.
translation.it: Prendevamo Maggie, dritti in palestra.

translation.it: Maggie Nichols, livello dieci junior dalla Twin City Twister.

translation.en: [Maggie] The goal was to try to be an elite gymnast and to make the national team.
translation.it: L'obiettivo era diventare una ginnasta d'élite ed entrare nella nazionale.

translation.en: And this is probably one of my favorite leos. Um...

translation.en: I love the white.

translation.en: Like, I don't know what it is, but if it has white on it, I just-- I just love it.
translation.it: Non so perché, ma se c'è un po' di bianco, mi piace.

translation.en: I don't know why. [laughs]
translation.it: Non so perché.

translation.en: If you wanted to take the next step to make national team,
translation.it: Se volevi fare il passo successivo ed entrare nella nazionale,

translation.en: you need to be very strong, because gymnastics would be like...
translation.it: dovevi essere molto forte, perché la ginnastica era...

translation.en: you know, almost your whole life. I mean, it was almost my whole life.
translation.it: quasi tutta tua la vita. Cioè, era quasi tutta la mia vita.

translation.en: You give up almost everything.

translation.en: what actually happened.
translation.it: quello che successe veramente.

translation.en: Evidence, I would say.

translation.en: [man] So you're watching justice happen in slow motion?

translation.en: Well, hopefully justice. [laughs]
translation.it: Speriamo sia fatta giustizia.

translation.en: Hopefully justice.
translation.it: Lo speriamo.

translation.en: [man] When we started reporting on the initial story,
translation.it: Quando abbiamo iniziato a parlare di questa storia...

translation.en: this was really the most explosive story
translation.it: era davvero l'inchiesta più esplosiva

translation.en: that the USA Today Network has had in several years.
translation.it: che USA Today Network pubblicasse in tanti anni.

translation.en: Yet it was coming out of the sticks, you know?
translation.it: Eppure proveniva da un ambiente provinciale.

translation.en: [laughs] It was coming out of a small little newsroom.
translation.it: Proveniva da una piccola redazione.

translation.en: Okay, what do we got?
translation.it: Ok, cos'abbiamo?

translation.en: Um, one of our sources who runs the popular blog--
translation.it: Una delle nostre fonti, che gestisce il blog...

translation.it: Come tutti, guardavo la ginnastica durante le Olimpiadi

translation.en: and I had witnessed some of the stars, you know, over the years.
translation.it: e nel corso degli anni ho visto nascere alcune stelle.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics was an organization in this town,
translation.it: La USA Gymnastics era un'organizzazione di questa città,

translation.en: but I really didn't know a lot about what was going on behind the scenes.
translation.it: ma non sapevo molto di quello che succedeva dietro le quinte.

translation.en: So, you know, what that culture was like was new to me and, uh...
translation.it: Quindi, beh, quella cultura mi era nuova, e...

translation.en: and we sort of were plunged into it.
translation.it: Finimmo per restarne coinvolti.

translation.en: [man 1] Every four years, it's our time to shine.
translation.it: Ogni quattro anni, è il nostro momento di brillare.

translation.en: Our moment.

translation.en: When the toughest sport in the world

translation.it: Il momento in cui il riflettore più luminoso brilla

translation.en: on the best athletes these United States have to offer.
translation.it: sui migliori atleti che questi USA hanno da offrire.

translation.en: Every four years...
translation.it: Ogni quattro anni...

translation.en: starts right now.
translation.it: inizia proprio adesso.

translation.en: [man 2] It is one of the most in-demand events at the Olympics, and it could be historic.
translation.it: È uno degli eventi più attesi delle Olimpiadi e potrebbe essere storico.

translation.en: In 1996, there was a Magnificent Seven.
translation.it: Nel 1996 c'erano le magnifiche sette.

translation.en: In 2012, a Fierce Five.
translation.it: Nel 2012, le cinque agguerrite.

translation.en: This group will make a name for themselves tonight one way or the other.
translation.it: Questo gruppo stasera si farà ricordare in un modo o nell'altro.

translation.en: [woman] As the Summer Olympics gets underway in Rio,
translation.it: Mentre a Rio sono in corso le olimpiadi estive,

translation.en: an IndyStar USA Today Network investigation
translation.it: un'indagine dell' IndyStar USA Today Network

translation.en: unveils a possible sexual abuse scandal at USA Gymnastics.
translation.it: rivela un possibile scandalo di abusi sessuali nella USA Gymnastics,

translation.en: It alleges the organization has a policy that may have harmed child athletes.
translation.it: ipotizzandone una politica che potrebbe aver danneggiato atleti minorenni.

translation.en: I had been working on an investigation
translation.it: Stavo lavorando a un'indagine

translation.en: into failure to report sexual abuse in schools.
translation.it: sulle mancate denunce di abusi sessuali nelle scuole.

translation.en: We'd had a number of local cases in Indiana.
translation.it: Avevamo una serie di casi locali in Indiana.

translation.en: And so, as I was looking at a broader piece on,
translation.it: Così, mentre cercavo ulteriori informazioni

translation.en: why does this seem to keep happening?
translation.it: sul perché continuasse a succedere,

translation.en: Why do people not report as they're required to do?
translation.it: sul perché la gente non sporgesse denuncia com'era giusto fare...

translation.en: A source suggested that I look at USA Gymnastics
translation.it: una fonte mi suggerì di guardare la USA Gymnastics

translation.en: and how they handle sexual abuse allegations.
translation.it: e come gestissero le accuse di abusi sessuali.

translation.en: And that source pointed me toward a lawsuit
translation.it: E quella fonte mi indicò una causa

translation.en: involving a predatory coach...
translation.it: che coinvolgeva un allenatore predatore...

translation.en: who had moved from gym to gym to gym,
translation.it: che era stato trasferito da una palestra all'altra

translation.en: despite warning signs about his conduct.
translation.it: nonostante i segnali di avvertimento su di lui.

translation.en: [man] One coach was shown to have abused a young gymnast
translation.it: Dimostrarono che un allenatore abusò di una ginnasta minorenne

translation.en: after USA Gymnastics had been warned about him years earlier.
translation.it: dopo che la USA Gymnastics era stata allertata anni prima sulla sua condotta.

translation.en: In the file, one complaint said,
translation.it: Nella denuncia c'era scritto:

translation.en: "This coach needs to be put in a cage before he rapes somebody."
translation.it: "Questo allenatore dev'essere messo in gabbia prima che possa stuprare qualcuno."

translation.en: Uh, USA Gymnastics did nothing.
translation.it: La USA Gymnastics non fece nulla.

translation.en: [Kwiatkowski] As we were pursuing this investigation, we got access to these depositions
translation.it: Mentre proseguivamo l'indagine, abbiamo avuto accesso a queste deposizioni

translation.en: with current and former high-ranking USA Gymnastics officials
translation.it: degli ufficiali di alto livello della USA Gymnastics

translation.en: that described their policy for how they handled these allegations.
translation.it: che descrivevano la politica di gestione di queste accuse.

translation.en: [man] Mr. Penny, uh, you are the president currently of USA Gymnastics?
translation.it: DEPOSIZIONE DI STEPHEN PENNY JR. Sig. Penny, lei è l'attuale presidente della USA Gymnastics?

translation.en: [Penny] Yes.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: [man] If you receive a complaint of sexual misconduct,
translation.it: Se ricevete una denuncia per molestie sessuali,

translation.en: whether it be by a professional member or anyone that has a membership with USAG,
translation.it: sia che riguardi un membro professionista o un membro della USAG,

translation.en: do you turn it over to local authorities?
translation.it: lo denunciate alle autorità locali?

translation.en: We don't turn over a complaint.
translation.it: Non sporgiamo denuncia.

translation.en: [Kwiatkowski] For the first time, it showed USA Gymnastics had a policy
translation.it: Per la prima volta, fu dimostrato che la USA Gymnastics

translation.en: of not reporting all allegations to authorities.
translation.it: non sporgeva denuncia alle autorità.

translation.en: That they would dismiss allegations as hearsay
translation.it: Che respingevano le accuse come dicerie

translation.en: unless they were signed by a victim, a victim's parent,
translation.it: a meno che non fossero firmate da una vittima, un genitore

translation.en: or an eyewitness to the abuse.
translation.it: o un testimone delle molestie.

translation.en: [Berta] And we found USA Gymnastics had sexual abuse complaint files
translation.it: E scoprimmo che la USA Gymnastics aveva ricevuto denunce di molestie sessuali

translation.en: on 54 coaches.
translation.it: contro 54 allenatori.

translation.en: And if there was no signed statement
translation.it: E se non c'era una dichiarazione firmata

translation.en: by the victim or the victim's parent, they just tucked it in a folder
translation.it: dalla vittima o da un suo genitore, la mettevano in una cartella

translation.en: and stuffed it in Steve Penny's filing cabinet.
translation.it: e la infilavano nell'armadietto di Steve Penny.

translation.en: And then those coaches went on to molest other children.
translation.it: E poi quegli allenatori molestavano altre bambine.

translation.en: [man 1] Get the gold medals ready again.
translation.it: Preparate di nuovo le medaglie d'oro.

translation.en: [man 2] That is an Olympic gold medal-winning moment.
translation.it: Questo è un momento da medaglia d'oro olimpica.

translation.en: [woman 1] As athletes are gathering in Rio,
translation.it: Mentre le atlete si radunano a Rio,

translation.en: a stunning report from The Indianapolis Star
translation.it: oggi ha tenuto banco una straordinaria inchiesta

translation.en: and USA Today Network dominated this day.
translation.it: dell' Indianapolis Star e lo USA Today Network.

translation.en: [woman 2] The paper is reporting that, on multiple occasions,
translation.it: Il giornale riporta che, in varie occasioni,

translation.en: USA Gymnastics compiled complaints of coaches accused of sexual misconduct
translation.it: la USA Gymnastics ha raccolto le denunce per molestie sessuali contro degli allenatori,

translation.en: but refused to share the information with police,
translation.it: ma si è rifiutata di riportarle alla polizia.

translation.en: most often dismissing it as hearsay,
translation.it: Il più delle volte bollandole come dicerie

translation.en: because the complaints were not made by the victims,
translation.it: perché le denunce non venivano dalle vittime,

translation.en: those young athletes, or their parents.
translation.it: le giovani atlete, o dai loro genitori.

translation.en: [woman 1] In a statement, Steve Penny, the president of USA Gymnastics,
translation.it: La domanda stamattina... Steve Penny, presidente della USA Gymnastics,

translation.en: said the organization is quote, "Committed to promoting a safe environment,"
translation.it: ha detto che l'organizzazione è "impegnata a promuovere un ambiente sicuro".

translation.en: and noted quote, "We feel The Star left out significant facts
translation.it: E fa notare: "Pensiamo che il The Star abbia tralasciato fatti importanti

translation.en: that would have painted a more accurate picture."
translation.it: che avrebbero dipinto un quadro più preciso".

translation.en: [woman] I was cleaning my kitchen,
translation.it: Stavo pulendo la cucina

translation.en: and I had two babies that were 13 months apart.
translation.it: e avevo due bambini che si correvano 13 mesi,

translation.en: And they were both fussy,
translation.it: entrambi capricciosi.

translation.en: and so I had my baby strapped to me.
translation.it: Perciò tenevo in braccio la piccola.

translation.en: I was wearing her while I cleaned the kitchen.
translation.it: Nel mentre pulivo la cucina.

translation.en: And I needed to make a shopping list, so I opened my computer
translation.it: Dovevo fare la lista della spesa, così aprii il computer.

translation.en: and Facebook was up,
translation.it: C'era Facebook aperto,

translation.en: and trending in the news section was the headline for the IndyStar article.
translation.it: e nella sezione delle notizie c'era l'articolo dell' IndyStar.

translation.en: It was a complete accident that I even saw it.
translation.it: Lo vidi per puro caso.

translation.en: But I clicked on it, and I read it right away.
translation.it: Ma ci cliccai sopra e lo lessi subito.

translation.en: And the first thought was, "I was right.
translation.it: Il primo pensiero fu: "Avevo ragione.

translation.en: They've been burying sexual abuse. I was right.
translation.it: Hanno nascosto le molestie sessuali. Avevo ragione.

translation.en: And this is it.
translation.it: Eccoci qua.

translation.en: Now's the time.
translation.it: È il momento.

translation.en: If it's ever going to come out, it's going to come out now."
translation.it: Se deve uscire, uscirà adesso".

translation.en: [Alesia] On the morning of publication of that first story...
translation.it: La mattina della pubblicazione del primo articolo...

translation.en: we got an e-mail from Rachael Denhollander.
translation.it: ci arrivò un'email da Rachael Denhollander.

translation.en: And she wrote, "My abuse wasn't by a coach,
translation.it: Scriveva: "Io non sono stata molestata da un allenatore,

translation.en: but it was by a famous doctor.
translation.it: ma da un medico famoso.

translation.en: And if they're covering things up for the coaches,
translation.it: E se stanno coprendo gli allenatori,

translation.en: I think they would be covering it up for him."
translation.it: penso che stiano coprendo anche lui".

translation.en: And that was the first time
translation.it: E quella fu la prima volta

translation.en: I had heard there could be something wrong with Larry Nassar.
translation.it: che ricevetti qualcosa di strano su Larry Nassar.

translation.en: [woman] Hi, Mr. Alesia. My name is Jessica Howard.
translation.it: Salve, sig. Alesia. Mi chiamo Jessica Howard.

translation.en: I just wanted to call you as a follow-up to your story.
translation.it: La chiamo dopo aver letto il suo articolo.

translation.en: Um, I am very nervous about talking to you about it, but...
translation.it: Il fatto di parlarne con lei mi rende molto nervosa, ma...

translation.en: I think it would help...
translation.it: forse potrebbe aiutare

translation.en: bring justice to a lot of the people
translation.it: a rendere giustizia a molte persone

translation.en: who have been affected by USA Gymnastics and their policies.
translation.it: che sono state rovinate dalla USA Gymnastics e la sua condotta.

translation.en: Thank you. Bye.
translation.it: Grazie. Arrivederci.

translation.en: When the...
translation.it: Quando la...

translation.en: story came out in 2016...
translation.it: storia uscì nel 2016...

translation.en: Nassar just came back into my head.
translation.it: mi tornò subito in mente Nassar.

translation.en: When something hits you like...
translation.it: Quando qualcosa ti colpisce come...

translation.en: that realization that it was sexual abuse...
translation.it: la consapevolezza che si trattava di abusi sessuali...

translation.en: and you haven't known, haven't thought about it...
translation.it: e non lo sapevi, non ci avevi pensato...

translation.en: it becomes...
translation.it: ...diventa...

translation.en: so real.
translation.it: così reale.

translation.en: Like it was yesterday.
translation.it: Come se fosse successo ieri.

translation.en: Like it just happened to you. Like you are 15.
translation.it: Come se fosse successo a te. Come se avessi 15 anni.

translation.en: [Dantzscher] My head started kind of like spinning a little bit.
translation.it: Iniziò a girarmi un po' la testa.

translation.en: I've never told anybody, but...
translation.it: Non l'avevo mai detto a nessuno, ma...

translation.en: I was like, "Wait a minute...
translation.it: pensai: "Aspetta un attimo...

translation.en: this doctor used to do very similar things to me."
translation.it: questo dottore mi faceva cose molto simili".

translation.en: At that point, I was...
translation.it: A quel punto, ero...

translation.en: still scared, but...
translation.it: ancora spaventata, ma...

translation.en: I was thinking, "If he is a pedophile...
translation.it: pensai: "Se è... un pedofilo...

translation.en: and I...
translation.it: e io...

translation.en: don't do something about it, I can't live with that."
translation.it: non faccio niente, non posso convivere con questo".

translation.en: [man] I was approached by Jamie Dantzscher,
translation.it: Mi avvicinò Jamie Dantzscher,

translation.en: who was a 2000 Olympian.
translation.it: un'olimpionica del 2000.

translation.en: And she told me
translation.it: Mi raccontò

translation.en: the story about this. Dr. Nassar,
translation.it: la storia di questo Dott. Nassar,

translation.en: and she felt like he had sexually assaulted her.
translation.it: e disse che credeva di essere stata molestata da lui.

translation.en: I believed her.
translation.it: Io le credetti.

translation.en: After I agreed to take her case, I called The Indianapolis Star.
translation.it: Dopo aver accettato il suo caso, chiamai l' Indianapolis Star.

translation.en: And I said, "Great article.
translation.it: Dissi: "Gran bell'articolo.

translation.en: By the way, have you ever heard of a guy named Larry Nassar?"
translation.it: A proposito, avete sentito parlare di un certo Larry Nassar?"

translation.en: I... I was stunned.
translation.it: Ero... ero sbalordito.

translation.en: I mean, I just thought, "Now this is-- Now we're talking three people."
translation.it: Pensai: "Ora parliamo di tre persone".

translation.en: And these women didn't know each other.
translation.it: E queste donne non si conoscevano.

translation.en: How many more could there be?
translation.it: Quante altre ce n'erano?

translation.en: [man 1] Oh, golly.
translation.it: Oh, cavolo.

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, dear. Oh, dear. Oh, dear. -[man 1] Oh, God.
translation.it: - Oh, cielo. - Oddio.

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, no. -Medical?
translation.it: - Oh, no. - Medico?

translation.en: Shh-shh-shh. Easy. easy, easy, easy.
translation.it: Calma.

translation.en: [man 2] You can obviously see the shaking of the head, the resignation.
translation.it: Si vede chiaramente scuotere la testa, la rassegnazione.

translation.en: Everybody knows this goes with the territory, and they hate it.
translation.it: Tutti sanno che può succedere, e lo detestano.

translation.en: [man 1] Medical staff. Dr. Larry Nassar on the floor.
translation.it: Lo staff medico. A terra c'è il Dott. Larry Nassar.

translation.en: He keeps these women together.
translation.it: Lui tiene insieme queste donne.

translation.en: [Kwiatkowski] Larry Nassar had been the team doctor
translation.it: Larry Nassar era il medico sportivo

translation.en: for USA Gymnastics' women's program for 29 years.
translation.it: del programma femminile della USA Gymnastics da 29 anni.

translation.en: He was also a Michigan State University doctor at the time.
translation.it: All'epoca era anche medico dell'Università Statale del Michigan.

translation.en: So he was this prominent member of the community...
translation.it: Quindi era un membro di spicco della comunità...

translation.en: when we got these allegations about him.
translation.it: quando ricevemmo queste accuse contro di lui.

translation.en: Hello and welcome to GymnasticsDoctor.com.
translation.it: Salve e benvenuti a GymnasticsDoctor.com.

translation.en: This is part of the sports medicine tender teaching moments.
translation.it: Questo è uno dei momenti di formazione della medicina sportiva.

translation.en: I call these TTX.
translation.it: Io li chiamo TTX.

translation.en: Over and over and over.
translation.it: Uno strato dopo l'altro.

translation.en: Around and around and around.
translation.it: Giro ancora e ancora.

translation.en: It's amazing, the number of treatments
translation.it: È incredibile quanti trattamenti

translation.en: that these kids will get to keep them healthy enough
translation.it: devono fare le ragazze per restare in forma

translation.en: to sustain them at the World Championship level,
translation.it: e affrontare competizioni a livello mondiale

translation.en: Olympic Championship level that they are.

translation.en: Um, we'll treat them before practice.

translation.it: Sono due al giorno. Restiamo per il secondo allenamento.

translation.en: Then we treat them to the point that they go to bed.

translation.en: So we usually see them at seven in the morning and get done at ten at night.
translation.it: Quindi di solito le vediamo alle sette di mattina e alle dieci di sera.

translation.en: [man] In medical school, he worked as a trainer. He rose up as a volunteer.
translation.it: A Medicina, lavorava come formatore. Si offrì volontario.

translation.it: Poi, quando entrò nello staff dell'Università,

translation.en: part of his requirement was to do community work.

translation.en: So Marisa flew out to California and, uh, met with John Manly and Jamie Dantzscher.

translation.it: ma non era pronta per essere inclusa nella storia, neanche come "Jane Doe".

translation.en: But her story helped us have confidence,

translation.en: because it corroborated everything we'd heard from Jamie and we'd heard from Rachael.
translation.it: perché confermava tutto quello che avevano detto Jamie e Rachael.

translation.en: with her name...

translation.en: in her home.
translation.it: a casa sua.

translation.en: Tell me more about why now, why...
translation.it: Dimmi perché proprio adesso. Perché...

translation.en: you know, why... why you're willing to be brave enough to talk with me.
translation.it: Perché hai trovato il coraggio di parlare con me.

translation.en: Um, I didn't know a lot when I was 15,
translation.it: A 15 anni non sapevo molte cose.

translation.en: but one thing I did know was that abuse victims aren't treated well.
translation.it: Ma sapevo che le vittime di abusi non sono trattate bene.

translation.en: They are mocked. They are questioned. They are blamed. They are shamed.
translation.it: Vengono derise. Vengono interrogate. Vengono incolpate. Vengono umiliate.

translation.en: Um, and that does incredible damage to the healing process.
translation.it: E questo provoca danni incredibili al processo di guarigione.

translation.en: I wish I could have dealt with it 16 years ago.
translation.it: Vorrei averlo affrontato 16 anni fa.

translation.en: I don't think I could have, but I can now.
translation.it: Non credo che avrei potuto. Ma ora sì.

translation.en: I was very much a perfectionist,
translation.it: Ero una perfezionista

translation.en: and that's what attracted me to the sport of gymnastics,
translation.it: ed è questo che mi ha attratto della ginnastica.

translation.en: was the perfection that it required.
translation.it: La perfezione che richiedeva.

translation.en: But my family wasn't able to afford gym fees,
translation.it: Ma i miei non potevano permettersi le quote della palestra,

translation.en: so I didn't start until I was almost 12.
translation.it: quindi iniziai solo a 12 anni.

translation.en: Because, at that point, I could work,
translation.it: A quel punto potevo lavorare.

translation.en: and my siblings helped me clean the gym, and my mom worked to pay for my gym fees.
translation.it: I miei fratelli mi aiutavano a pulire la palestra e mia madre lavorava per pagare le quote.

translation.en: But I was five-four when I started. Way too tall, long torso, wrong body type.
translation.it: Ma ero alta un metro e 62 quando iniziai. Troppo alta, busto lungo, corpo sbagliato.

translation.en: I did it because I loved it. I was not any good.

translation.en: It was like my first love. I loved everything about it.

translation.en: I was crazy. I look back now,

translation.it: e avevo solo nove anni.

translation.en: I had no idea how talented I was. I was just... I was just having a good time.

translation.en: Come on, Jamie.

translation.it: Ricordo che avevo i talloni contusi.

translation.en: I couldn't even, like, walk on the carpet.

translation.en: I mean, I had broken toes I competed on and trained on,

translation.en: a fractured back I actually competed on.

translation.en: -[woman] Oh! Bela's gonna love that one! -[crowd cheering]
translation.it: Bela lo adorerà!

translation.en: But yet, it was like every time I had an injury, I wasn't believed.
translation.it: Ma ogni volta che mi facevo male, nessuno mi credeva.

translation.en: [Dantzscher] As far as weight...
translation.it: Per quanto riguarda il peso...

translation.en: And...
I remember Beth telling me...
translation.it: ricordo che Beth mi disse...

translation.en: you know, "You lost six pounds. Now we've got to figure out how to keep it off."
translation.it: "Hai perso tre chili. Ora dobbiamo capire come non riprenderli."

translation.en: And to hear they don't care how you do it had a huge effect on me.
translation.it: Sentire che a loro non importava come, ebbe un grande effetto su di me.

translation.en: I mean, back then, I didn't even think of it as abuse.

translation.en: That's kind of--
translation.it: È una specie di...

translation.en: 'cause I almost still feel bad for even...

translation.en: saying the truth.

translation.en: Like I almost...
translation.it: È come se...

translation.en: Like I hate this sentence, but I actually, like, looked forward to treatment.

translation.en: And-- Because Larry was...
translation.it: E... dato che Larry era...

translation.en: the only nice adult.

translation.en: being...

translation.it: staff della USA Gymnastics.

translation.en: He was really the only...

translation.it: A 13 anni mi qualificai per la ginnastica d'élite.

translation.en: And when I was 15, I finally made the national team.
translation.it: E a 15 anni entrai finalmente nella nazionale.

translation.en: [woman] If she keeps this up, she has a great shot
translation.it: Se continua così, ha buone possibilità di partecipare alle Olimpiadi l'anno prossimo.

translation.it: di partecipare alle Olimpiadi l'anno prossimo.

translation.en: [man] She's still right in the hunt...

translation.en: to come second to Simone.
translation.it: del secondo posto dopo Simone.

translation.en: And Martha and Bela Karolyi owned it.
translation.it: Era di Martha e Bela Karolyi.

translation.en: Martha would walk out of her office, and we'd all... [gasps]
translation.it: Martha usciva dal suo ufficio e noi ci mettevamo così,

translation.en: ...go like this and go shortest to tallest in a line.
translation.it: Martha usciva dal suo ufficio e noi ci mettevamo così, in fila in ordine di altezza.

translation.en: We trained about seven hours a day.
translation.it: Ci allenavamo sette ore al giorno.

translation.en: And they ranked us from top to bottom.
translation.it: Ci classificavano dalla prima all'ultima.

translation.en: We just had so many eyes on us.

translation.en: National staff, our own home coaches, other athletes.
translation.it: Lo staff della nazionale, gli allenatori, altri atleti.

translation.en: So it was pretty intense.

translation.en: [Gina] I remember Maggie saying that it was really scary,

translation.en: and they were very strict.

translation.en: But it was an honor.

translation.en: That's where the Olympic athletes come from.

translation.en: You get on that team, and now you have a shot.

translation.en: [Gina] The parents were never allowed to go to the ranch.

translation.en: I could hardly ever talk to her when she was there

translation.en: because they didn't have cell phone reception.

translation.en: and better for their sport.

translation.en: And so we had to, you know, trust and believe in... in their system.
translation.it: E quindi dovevamo fidarci e credere nel loro sistema.

translation.en: You know, you would think they'd be able to keep,
translation.it: Dovrebbero essere in grado di tenere...

translation.it: la gente al sicuro. Soprattutto se...

translation.en: not allowed to set foot on the property.

translation.en: But I knew nothing about Nassar.
translation.it: Ma non sapevo niente di Nassar.

translation.en: I never even thought to ask those questions,
translation.it: E non ho mai pensato di fare certe domande,

translation.en: because I didn't even know he was there.
translation.it: perché non sapevo neanche che fosse lì.

translation.en: [Maggie] In 2015, Larry was doing treatments for my back.
translation.it: Nel 2015, Larry mi stava curando la schiena.

translation.en: And there's this room called the back room
translation.it: C'era una stanza chiamata "back room"

translation.en: where we, like, watched TV and got massages and stuff.
translation.it: dove guardavamo la TV, ci massaggiavano, cose così.

translation.en: Um, he would just do it right there.
translation.it: Lui lo faceva proprio lì.

translation.en: And I was just, like, kind of, like, confused and, like, wondering what it was.
translation.it: Io mi sentivo un po' confusa e mi chiedevo perché.

translation.en: It didn't seem right.
translation.it: C'era qualcosa di strano.

translation.en: Um, because I grew up always going to physical therapy and stuff,
translation.it: Perché sono cresciuta facendo fisioterapia,

translation.en: because I had many injuries growing up,
translation.it: dato che mi infortunavo molto,

translation.en: um, and I'd never experienced anything like that.
translation.it: e non avevo mai fatto niente di simile.

translation.en: So I thought I'd ask Aly just 'cause...
translation.it: Così pensai di chiedere ad Aly perché...

translation.en: I mean, we were really close friends, and she was older, too,
translation.it: Insomma, eravamo molto amiche e lei era più grande,

translation.en: and has been to national team camps and has worked with him before.
translation.it: era stata ai campi della nazionale e aveva lavorato con lui.

translation.en: So I kind of just asked her. I was like, "Does he do this to you? Is this normal?"
translation.it: Quindi glielo chiesi. Chiesi: "Lo fa anche a te? È normale?"

translation.en: And she said, "Yeah, like, he does it to me, too."
translation.it: E lei rispose: "Sì, lo fa anche a me".

translation.en: Maggie's coach, Sarah Jantzi, called me up, and she said,
translation.it: ALLENATRICE DI MAGGIE L'allenatrice di Maggie, Sarah Jantzi, mi chiamò e disse:

translation.en: "I want to let you know that I overheard from Maggie and another athlete...
translation.it: "Volevo dirti che ho sentito Maggie dire a un'altra atleta...

translation.en: that Larry Nassar was touching her funny,
translation.it: che Larry Nassar la tocca in modo strano.

translation.en: and Maggie told her he was, you know, touching her private parts.
translation.it: Maggie le ha detto che tocca le sue parti intime.

translation.en: He was putting his hands in her vagina, and he was fingering her."
translation.it: Infila le mani nella sua vagina e l'accarezza con le dita."

translation.en: And I'm like...
translation.it: Io faccio...

translation.en: "What?"
translation.it: "Cosa?"

translation.en: And I said, "We need to call the authorities."
translation.it: Le dissi: "Chiamiamo la polizia".

translation.en: And she said, "Yeah, I'm gonna call Rhonda Faehn,
translation.it: E lei: "Sì, chiamo Rhonda Faehn",

translation.en: who is in charge of the women's program, right away." So she did.
translation.it: che si occupava delle ragazze, "subito". E così fece.

translation.en: And then, the next day, Steve Penny called me.
translation.it: Il giorno dopo mi chiamò Steve Penny.

translation.en: I've never spoken to him personally.
translation.it: Non gli avevo mai parlato personalmente.

translation.en: All he said was,
translation.it: Disse semplicemente:

translation.en: "I hear you have a concern."
translation.it: "Mi hanno detto che è preoccupata."

translation.en: I said, "A concern?
translation.it: Dissi: "Preoccupata?

translation.en: I have... This is... My daughter was molested.
translation.it: Ho... Questo è... Mia figlia è stata molestata.

translation.en: We need to call the authorities."
translation.it: Dobbiamo chiamare la polizia."

translation.en: He said, "No, no, no, don't worry about that. I will take care of that.
translation.it: Disse: "No, non si preoccupi. Ci penso io.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics will take care of calling the police."
translation.it: Sarà la USA Gymnastics a chiamare la polizia".

translation.en: Three or four weeks later, Steve Penny calls me again,
translation.it: Tre o quattro settimane dopo, Steve Penny mi chiama di nuovo.

translation.en: and he says, "Well, now, we want you to talk to an investigator.
translation.it: Mi fa: "Vogliamo che si rivolga ad un'investigatrice.

translation.en: Her name is Fran Sepler."
translation.it: Si chiama Fran Sepler".

translation.en: I thought "Well, maybe this is what they do with child sexual abuse cases."
translation.it: Ho pensato: "Forse è la prassi, in caso di abusi sessuali sui minori".

translation.en: I'd never been involved with one, so I didn't know.
translation.it: Non mi era mai capitato, quindi non lo sapevo.

translation.en: You know, at competitions, following...
translation.it: Sapete, alle gare, dopo...

translation.en: you know, Maggie's reporting...
translation.it: la denuncia di Maggie...

translation.en: Steve Penny would always tell me...
translation.it: Steve Penny mi diceva sempre...

translation.en: that, "Don't worry about Maggie.
translation.it: "Non preoccuparti per Maggie.

translation.en: We'll take care of Maggie. Don't worry about Maggie. We got Maggie."
translation.it: Ci pensiamo noi a lei. Non preoccuparti, la sosteniamo."

translation.en: So why would I not believe him?
translation.it: Perché non dovevo credergli?

translation.en: You know, we're talking USA Gymnastics.
translation.it: Insomma, parliamo della USA Gymnastics.

translation.en: We're talking US Olympics.
translation.it: Delle Olimpiadi statunitensi.

translation.en: -[phone beeps] -[Evans] Can you hear us all right?
translation.it: Ci senti bene?

translation.en: -I can. Can you hear me? -Yeah, we've got you on speaker,
translation.it: Sì. Voi mi sentite? Sì, siamo in vivavoce,

translation.en: -so if it's weird, let us know. -Okay.
translation.it: - se c'è qualcosa di strano, diccelo. - Ok.

translation.en: So... This is Steve Berta.
translation.it: Allora... Sono Steve Berta.

translation.en: When you were active in gymnastics, were there coaches,
translation.it: Quando praticavi la ginnastica, c'erano allenatori

translation.en: or other officials like Nassar, who the girls were suspicious of
translation.it: o altri ufficiali come Nassar, di cui le ragazze sospettavano

translation.en: or talked about as being abusive?
translation.it: o parlavano riportandone delle molestie?

translation.en: [Sey] Yes, absolutely.
translation.it: Assolutamente sì.

translation.en: There were sexual predators everywhere.
translation.it: C'erano predatori sessuali ovunque.

translation.en: They were in my gym.
translation.it: Nella mia palestra.

translation.en: The national team coach, Don Peters, was a known sexual abuser.
translation.it: L'allenatore della nazionale, Don Peters, era un noto molestatore sessuale.

translation.en: They were everywhere across the country, and we knew who they were.
translation.it: Erano ovunque in tutta la nazione e sapevamo chi erano.

translation.en: Uh, but, more broadly, emotional and physical abuse was actually the norm,
translation.it: Ma, più in generale, l'abuso emotivo e fisico erano la norma,

translation.en: and we were all so beaten down by that...
translation.it: ci demoralizzavano tantissimo...

translation.en: um, and made so obedient
translation.it: e ci rendevano così obbedienti

translation.en: that, when we knew that there was a sexual abuser in our midst,
translation.it: che, quando sapevamo che c'era un molestatore sessuale in mezzo a noi,

translation.en: we would never say anything. We were just...
translation.it: non dicevamo mai niente. Eravamo solo...

translation.en: We felt utterly powerless.
translation.it: Ci sentivamo del tutto impotenti.

translation.en: [woman] Now watch her face after this tumbling pass. She's hurt her ankle.
translation.it: Guardate il suo viso dopo questo passaggio. Si fa male alla caviglia.

translation.en: Do you see that little grimace? It hurts her.
translation.it: Avete visto quella smorfia? Le fa male.

translation.en: [man] But she must go on here, the title at stake.
translation.it: Ma deve continuare. È in gioco il titolo.

translation.en: The courage of Jennifer Sey led her on to the title
translation.it: Il coraggio di Jennifer Sey l'ha portata al titolo

translation.en: as women's all-around champion of the USA,
translation.it: di campionessa individuale femminile degli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: but the pain was a heavy price.
translation.it: Ma il dolore è stato un prezzo pesante.

translation.en: [Sey] I started the sport in the mid-'70s.
translation.it: Iniziai questo sport a metà degli anni '70.

translation.en: And, I would say, the standard methodology
translation.it: E direi che il metodo standard

translation.en: of coaching in elite gymnastics was cruelty.
translation.it: per allenare le ginnaste d'élite era la crudeltà.

translation.en: That was the accepted methodology.
translation.it: Quella era la metodologia accettata.

translation.en: You could be as cruel as you needed to be
translation.it: Potevi essere crudele quanto volevi

translation.en: to get what you needed out of your athlete.
translation.it: per ottenere ciò che volevi dal tuo atleta.

translation.en: Um, so this is not new.
translation.it: Quindi non è una novità.

translation.en: We just weren't good at it. We weren't getting great results.
translation.it: Non eravamo brave. Non stavamo ottenendo grandi risultati.

translation.en: We were getting okay results.
translation.it: Eravamo nella media.

translation.en: [man] Bela and Martha Karolyi, husband and wife,
translation.it: COORDINATORI DELLA NAZIONALE FEMMINILE USA GYMNASTICS Bela e Martha Karolyi, marito e moglie, che squadra di allenatori sono.

translation.en: and what a coaching team they are.
translation.it: Bela e Martha Karolyi, marito e moglie, che squadra di allenatori sono.

translation.en: [Sey] And then Bela and Martha Karolyi came here, and they...
translation.it: E poi arrivarono Bela e Martha Karolyi, e loro...

translation.en: validated that approach.
translation.it: confermarono quell'approccio.

translation.en: If success is winning, you know, medals in the Olympics,
translation.it: Se il successo è vincere le medaglie olimpiche,

translation.en: then, you know, they proved that that methodology was successful
translation.it: allora dimostrarono che quella metodologia era vincente

translation.en: and was the right way to coach.
translation.it: ed era il modo giusto di allenare.

translation.en: People know the Karolyis, but I'm not sure many of them really know their history.
translation.it: La gente conosce i Karolyi, ma non so se molti conoscano la loro storia.

translation.en: [woman] Chris, this could be the highlight of the compulsory event.
translation.it: Chris, questo potrebbe essere il momento saliente.

translation.en: She is one of the technically strongest, best gymnasts that I've ever seen.
translation.it: Lei è una delle ginnaste tecnicamente più forti che abbia mai visto.

translation.en: Watch this.
translation.it: Guarda.

translation.en: Beautiful rhythm. Right to a handstand.
translation.it: Un ritmo bellissimo fino alla verticale.

translation.en: Oh, look at that amplitude.
translation.it: Guarda che ampiezza.

translation.en: [man] Faultless. Absolutely faultless.
translation.it: Impeccabile. Assolutamente impeccabile.

translation.en: Now, what are the judges gonna say about that?
translation.it: Ora cosa diranno i giudici?

translation.en: There's the smile.
translation.it: Ecco il sorriso.

translation.en: Some cynics say it had to be trained...
translation.it: Alcuni cinici dicono che ha dovuto imparare a farlo

translation.en: because she so rarely smiles.
translation.it: perché sorride raramente.

translation.en: [Manly] They were Nicolae Ceausescu's chosen coaches
translation.it: Erano gli allenatori scelti da Nicolae Ceauşescu

translation.en: for the Romanian national gymnastics team.
translation.it: per la nazionale rumena di ginnastica.

translation.en: And they coached Nadia Comaneci to a gold medal in 1976.
translation.it: E allenarono Nadia Comaneci per la medaglia d'oro nel 1976.

translation.en: [Sey] If you look back at teams from the '50s and the '60s,
translation.it: Se guardate le squadre degli anni '50 e '60,

translation.en: they look like grown women.
translation.it: sembrano donne adulte.

translation.en: They are grown women.
translation.it: In effetti, lo sono.

translation.en: But that started to change in the late '60s,
translation.it: Ma questo iniziò a cambiare alla fine degli anni '60

translation.en: but really solidified in 1976
translation.it: e si consolidò nel 1976,

translation.en: when Nadia won the Olympics as a 14-year-old.
translation.it: quando Nadia vinse le Olimpiadi a 14 anni.

translation.en: And there was just this mad rush of little girls that wanted to do gymnastics,
translation.it: Ci fu una folle corsa di ragazzine che volevano fare ginnastica,

translation.en: 'cause we related to her.
translation.it: perché ci identificavamo in lei.

translation.en: And what emerged was an aesthetic that was very, very young. Childlike.
translation.it: E ciò che emerse fu un'estetica molto, molto giovane. Infantile.

translation.en: And so it created a really dangerous environment,
translation.it: E così si creò un ambiente molto pericoloso,

translation.en: because eating disorders became very prevalent.
translation.it: perché iniziarono a diffondersi i disturbi alimentari.

translation.en: You know, delaying menstruation and delaying maturation.
translation.it: Il ritardo delle mestruazioni e dello sviluppo.

translation.en: But I think people really believed
translation.it: Ma penso che la gente credesse davvero

translation.en: that, for the more difficult skills to be performed, you had to be tiny.
translation.it: che, per eseguire gli esercizi più difficili, dovevi essere minuta.

translation.en: There's also the benefit of the coaches
translation.it: E poi gli allenatori hanno più controllo,

translation.en: having more control when the girls are younger.
translation.it: se le ragazze sono più piccole.

translation.en: [Manly] What's important for people to know is that Nicolae Ceausescu and his regime
translation.it: Ciò che la gente deve sapere è che Nicolae Ceauşescu e il suo regime

translation.en: was arguably the most repressive regime in the Eastern Bloc.
translation.it: erano probabilmente il regime più repressivo del blocco orientale.

translation.en: And the Karolyis were part of that system.
translation.it: E i Karolyi facevano parte di quel sistema.

translation.en: [man] The Romanians started this idea
translation.it: I rumeni diedero vita a questa idea...

translation.en: of training gymnasts from a very young age.
translation.it: delle ginnaste allenate fin da piccole.

translation.en: Like from six years old, they are selected from their kindergarten
translation.it: Fin dai sei anni, vengono scelte all'asilo

translation.en: or elementary schools,
translation.it: o nelle scuole elementari.

translation.en: and we tested them.
translation.it: E le mettevamo alla prova.

translation.en: Flexibility, strength and, uh, no fear.
translation.it: Flessibilità, forza e nessuna paura.

translation.en: -[woman] No fear? -No fear, yes. No fear.
translation.it: - Nessuna paura? - Sì. Nessuna.

translation.en: We have to put this in the context of the Cold War.
translation.it: Dobbiamo considerarlo nel contesto della Guerra Fredda.

translation.en: The Soviet Union or Romania,
translation.it: L'Unione Sovietica o la Romania

translation.en: they could not say, "Okay, we build better products
translation.it: potevano dire: "Ok, costruiamo prodotti migliori

translation.en: than the American side."
translation.it: di quelli americani".

translation.en: But we can have Nadia Comaneci.
translation.it: Ma possiamo avere Nadia Comaneci.

translation.en: Nadia was Romania's best product.
translation.it: Nadia era il miglior prodotto rumeno.

translation.en: [woman] 1976, Nadia was definitely the one to be like at that point,
translation.it: A quel punto bisognava essere come la Nadia del 1976,

translation.en: and the Russians, the Romanians, the East Germans,
translation.it: e i russi, i rumeni, i tedeschi orientali,

translation.en: all the, what we call the Communist Bloc,
translation.it: tutti quelli che facevano parte del cosiddetto blocco comunista,

translation.en: they were the best, by far, in the sport.
translation.it: erano i migliori in questo sport.

translation.en: And certainly, you always want to be like the ones who are winning.
translation.it: E naturalmente vuoi essere sempre come quelli che vincono.

translation.en: But we would be at competitions, and they always seemed very scared.
translation.it: Ma quando partecipavamo alle gare, loro sembravano sempre molto spaventate.

translation.en: The gymnasts did.
translation.it: Le ginnaste.

translation.en: And you never saw them talk,
translation.it: Non le vedevi mai parlare

translation.en: and they almost looked like robots.
translation.it: e sembravano quasi dei robot.

translation.en: The-- All I can say is the athletes...
translation.it: Posso solo dire che le atlete...

translation.en: did not look happy, ever.
translation.it: non sembravano felici, mai.

translation.en: [Pozsar] From the very beginning, Bela had this idea
translation.it: Fin dall'inizio, Bela ebbe quest'idea...

translation.en: that we will have total control over the girls
translation.it: che avremmo avuto il controllo totale sulle ragazze.

translation.en: absolute control.
translation.it: Il controllo assoluto.

translation.en: Bela was controlling their weight.
translation.it: Bela controllava il loro peso.

translation.en: They had to step every single day on a scale.
translation.it: Dovevano salire sulla bilancia ogni giorno.

translation.en: He was yelling at them and putting them down.
translation.it: Le sgridava, le umiliava.

translation.en: "Fat cow."
translation.it: "Grassona."

translation.en: "You are a pig."
translation.it: "Sei un maiale."

translation.en: He, you know, slapped the girls,
translation.it: Schiaffeggiava le ragazze

translation.en: and the girls were very, very scared.
translation.it: e loro erano molto, molto spaventate.

translation.en: Martha had this habit of grabbing their neck
translation.it: Martha aveva l'abitudine di afferrarle per il collo

translation.en: and get her fingers into their necks.
translation.it: e di conficcare le dita nella carne.

translation.en: Plus slap them, you know, a lot.
translation.it: E poi le schiaffeggiava spesso.

translation.en: The girls have the prints of the... her rings on their faces sometimes.
translation.it: A volte sulle ragazze rimanevano impressi i segni dei suoi anelli.

translation.en: [woman] Did you report it to the authorities?
translation.it: - L'ha detto alla polizia? - Sì, certo.

translation.en: [Pozsar] Yes, sure. I reported them, but also you have to understand
translation.it: Li denunciai, ma voi dovete anche capire

translation.en: that nobody took any kind of measures, you know, to stop them.
translation.it: che nessuno fece niente per fermarli.

translation.en: In Romania, that was acceptable.
translation.it: In Romania, era accettabile.

translation.en: [man] When he heads for his ranch on a rural highway north of Houston,
translation.it: Mentre si dirige verso il suo ranch su un'autostrada a nord di Houston,

translation.en: in his four-wheel drive with Merle Haggard on the dashboard cassette deck
translation.it: con le sue quattro ruote motrici, Merle Haggard nell'autoradio

translation.en: and a day's collection of bugs on the windshield...
translation.it: e una collezione di insetti sul parabrezza...

translation.en: well, you'd swear you were riding with a born Texan.
translation.it: beh, giurereste di essere in viaggio con un vero texano.

translation.en: When Bela Karolyi defected to the West, he defected to the West.
translation.it: Quando Bela Karolyi fuggì in occidente, fuggì in occidente.

translation.en: [Pozsar] When we defected together...
translation.it: Fuggimmo insieme.

translation.en: we knew that United States has lots and lots of talent.
translation.it: Sapevamo che gli Stati Uniti hanno un sacco di talenti.

translation.en: We saw the talent in the international competitions.
translation.it: Li vedevamo alle competizioni internazionali.

translation.en: And we know that it's a very, very fertile soil
translation.it: E sapevamo che è un terreno molto, molto fertile

translation.en: for athletes in United States.
translation.it: per gli atleti statunitensi.

translation.en: I declare open the Olympic Games of Los Angeles.
translation.it: Dichiaro aperti i giochi olimpici di Los Angeles.

translation.en: Never better, okay?
translation.it: Mai solo meglio, ok?

translation.en: The best... the best what you can vault, all right?
translation.it: Ma il meglio. Il meglio che sai fare, va bene?

translation.en: [Talavera] With Bela and Martha coming over here...
translation.it: Quando arrivarono Bela e Martha,

translation.en: we copy, cut, paste their style, and now we're doing it in the US.
translation.it: copiammo e incollammo il loro stile, che ora è quello degli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: We knew what their system was,
translation.it: Sapevamo che sistema utilizzavano.

translation.en: but we also knew they won all the time.
translation.it: Ma sapevamo anche che vincevano sempre.

translation.en: America loves a winner. And when a perky little bundle of energy
translation.it: L'America ama vincere. E quando Mary Lou Retton, un fagottino di energia della Virginia occidentale

translation.en: from West Virginia named Mary Lou Retton took home the gold medal in gymnastics
translation.it: E quando Mary Lou Retton, un fagottino di energia della Virginia occidentale ha portato a casa la medaglia d'oro alle Olimpiadi del '84,

translation.en: at the '84 Olympics, she became the national sweetheart.
translation.it: ha portato a casa la medaglia d'oro alle Olimpiadi del '84, è diventata il tesoro nazionale.

translation.en: [man] I was the president of USA Gymnastics in '84,
translation.it: Nell'84 ero il presidente della USA Gymnastics

translation.en: and one of my goals was I wanted our property on all the networks.
translation.it: e uno dei miei obiettivi era avere la nostra organizzazione su tutte le reti.

translation.en: That was the most valuable thing we could do to build our brand,
translation.it: Era il massimo per costruire il nostro marchio,

translation.en: the image of our sport.
translation.it: l'immagine del nostro sport.

translation.en: And then, all of a sudden, gymnastics was earning
translation.it: E poi, all'improvviso, la ginnastica guadagnava

translation.en: almost $12 million a year in revenue in 1991.
translation.it: quasi 12 milioni di dollari nel 1991.

translation.en: [Alesia] USA Gymnastics had a wholesome image,
translation.it: La USA Gymnastics aveva un'immagine sana.

translation.en: and they had companies who wanted to be attached to that image.
translation.it: C'erano aziende che volevano essere collegate a quell'immagine,

translation.en: And that image was vital, uh, to protect.
translation.it: e quell'immagine vitale andava protetta.

translation.en: [Penny] What makes this sport so special are the athletes.
translation.it: Sono gli atleti a rendere lo sport così speciale.

translation.en: I've never seen athletes that train as hard as these guys do
translation.it: Non ho mai visto atleti allenarsi così duramente,

translation.en: and that are as intelligent and personable.
translation.it: atleti così intelligenti e di bell'aspetto.

translation.en: I mean, it's just the complete package.
translation.it: Insomma, è il pacchetto completo.

translation.en: [Evans] Steve Penny was hired as vice president of marketing when they started out.
translation.it: All'inizio Steve Penny fu assunto come vicepresidente del marketing.

translation.en: He worked with television marketing, then he worked with USA Cycling.
translation.it: Lavorò nel marketing televisivo, poi per la USA Cycling.

translation.en: And, um, by the end of the '90s,
translation.it: E, alla fine degli anni '90,

translation.en: the focus of USA Gymnastics just became raising money...
translation.it: lo scopo della USA Gymnastics diventò raccogliere fondi...

translation.en: attracting sponsorships
translation.it: attirando sponsor

translation.en: and, you know, making the best out of their Olympic athletes.
translation.it: e traendo il meglio dai suoi atleti olimpici.

translation.en: [Berta] Eventually, Steve Penny became the president of USA Gymnastics.
translation.it: Alla fine, Steve Penny divenne presidente della USA Gymnastics.

translation.en: So you had an organization that was run by a sports marketing expert.
translation.it: Quindi era un'organizzazione gestita da un esperto di marketing sportivo.

translation.en: And, uh, that's what he cared about.
translation.it: Ed era questo che gli importava.

translation.en: He cared about marketing this brand.
translation.it: Commercializzare questo marchio.

translation.en: [man] This is the image of Bela Karolyi the world has grown accustomed to seeing.
translation.it: Questa è l'immagine di Bela Karolyi che il mondo è abituato a vedere.

translation.en: The intense, relentless coach
translation.it: L'allenatore intenso e implacabile

translation.en: who now turns out championship gymnasts for the United States.
translation.it: che ora crea campionesse ginnaste per gli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: [Berta] You know, these children are all being advised by adults
translation.it: Gli adulti consigliano queste bambine

translation.en: as to how they can realize their Olympic dream.
translation.it: su come realizzare il loro sogno olimpico.

translation.en: So you're basically using that child's dream to build this brand.
translation.it: Quindi, in pratica, sfrutti il sogno di quelle bambine per costruire questo marchio.

translation.en: And they were so busy trying to sell that brand...
translation.it: Ed erano così impegnati a vendere quel marchio...

translation.en: that they didn't have time for those girls.
translation.it: che non avevano tempo per quelle bambine.

translation.en: [man] Right now, we turn to women's gymnastics
translation.it: Ora ci rivolgiamo alla ginnastica femminile

translation.en: and the United States, which has become a power in recent years,
translation.it: e agli USA, che negli ultimi anni sono diventati un potere,

translation.en: now looking to become the power.
translation.it: e ora vogliono diventare il potere.

translation.en: I remember watching the Olympics in my little apartment, um, in 1996.
translation.it: Ricordo di aver guardato le Olimpiadi nel mio piccolo appartamento nel 1996.

translation.en: And Kerri Strug was vaulting.
translation.it: E Kerri Strug stava volteggiando.

translation.en: And it was viewed sort of as this heroic Olympic achievement,
translation.it: La sua esibizione fu vista come un successo olimpico eroico,

translation.en: but I saw it differently at the time.
translation.it: ma all'epoca io la vidi diversamente.

translation.en: [man] So, Kerri Strug, if she can score 9.493...
translation.it: Se Kerri Strug riesce a fare un punteggio di 9,493...

translation.en: then she will win the team gold...
translation.it: vincerà l'oro a squadre...

translation.en: for the USA.
translation.it: per gli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: She's the last to go. She's the only one who can do it.
translation.it: È l'ultima. È l'unica che può farcela.

translation.en: [woman] This is scary.
translation.it: Che spavento.

translation.en: [man] She is limping.
translation.it: Sta zoppicando.

translation.en: Here's the reaction of her parents.
translation.it: Ecco la reazione dei suoi genitori.

translation.en: And she falls on the first vault, and she's clearly in a lot of pain.
translation.it: Cade sul primo volteggio e chiaramente sta soffrendo molto.

translation.en: She's limping back to the other end of the runway.
translation.it: Torna all'inizio della pista zoppicando.

translation.en: We learn afterwards that she had been competing on a severe injury.
translation.it: Poi abbiamo saputo che aveva gareggiato con un grave infortunio.

translation.en: You can do it. You can do it.
translation.it: Puoi farcela.

translation.en: [Sey] You get two vaults, and the highest score counts.
translation.it: Su due volteggi vale il punteggio più alto

translation.en: And Team USA needed that second vault.
translation.it: e alla squadra USA serviva quel secondo volteggio.

translation.en: All right.
translation.it: Va bene.

translation.en: -[man] Go. -Go! Go!
translation.it: Vai!

translation.en: [Sey] And she does it. She lands the vault on one foot.
translation.it: E ce la fa. Atterra su un piede solo.

translation.en: [man] Kerri Strug is hurt.
translation.it: Kerri Strug è infortunata.

translation.en: [Sey] And she literally crawls off the mat.
translation.it: E striscia letteralmente via dal tappeto.

translation.en: She crawls away.
translation.it: Se ne va strisciando.

translation.en: [Sey] And Larry Nassar, at the time nobody knew, but is there.
translation.it: E Larry Nassar... all'epoca, nessuno lo sapeva... ma era lì.

translation.en: [man] She's being carried off...
translation.it: La portano via...

translation.en: by two of the medical technicians.
translation.it: due medici sportivi.

translation.en: We have got to find out if she's-- A 9.712! She has done it!
translation.it: Dobbiamo scoprire se... Un 9,712. Ce l'ha fatta!

translation.en: Kerri Strug has won the gold medal for the United States team.
translation.it: Kerri Strug ha vinto la medaglia d'oro per gli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: The Russians are in tears.
translation.it: Le russe sono in lacrime.

translation.en: They got so close, and the Americans took it away from them.
translation.it: Erano a un passo, e le americane gliel'hanno portata via.

translation.en: [Sey] And Bela swept her up and carried her off.
translation.it: Bela la prese in braccio e la portò via.

translation.en: And everybody's cheering her on as this hero,
translation.it: Tutti l'applaudivano come un'eroina,

translation.en: and all I could think was, "Why are we celebrating this?
translation.it: mentre io pensavo soltanto: "Cosa c'è da festeggiare?

translation.en: Don't pretend she had a choice."
translation.it: Non fingiamo che avesse scelta".

translation.en: Wave to the people.
translation.it: Saluta la gente.

translation.en: She was not gonna do anything but go do that vault.
translation.it: Non poteva fare altro che eseguire quel volteggio.

translation.en: We love winners in this country.
translation.it: Questa nazione ama i vincitori.

translation.en: This is a competitive country.
translation.it: Siamo una nazione competitiva.

translation.en: We consider ourselves the best in the world at everything.
translation.it: Ci consideriamo i migliori del mondo in tutto.

translation.en: Right?
translation.it: Ok?

translation.en: But this notion that we would sacrifice our young to win...
translation.it: Ma questa idea di sacrificare i nostri giovani per vincere...

translation.en: I think disgusts us a little.
translation.it: Penso ci disgusti un po'.

translation.en: We would never have said that that was the case.
translation.it: Non pensavamo che fosse questo il caso.

translation.en: You know, in other sports, the athletes are adults.
translation.it: Negli altri sport, gli atleti sono adulti.

translation.en: They can reasonably make choices about what they want.
translation.it: Possono scegliere ragionevolmente ciò che vogliono.

translation.en: I don't think that is true in gymnastics.
translation.it: Non credo che questo valga per la ginnastica.

translation.en: You know, these kids go to these national training centers when they're ten years old.
translation.it: Queste ragazze vanno nei centri di allenamento a dieci anni.

translation.en: They are abused and mistreated...
translation.it: Vengono abusate e maltrattate...

translation.en: for years.
translation.it: per anni.

translation.en: So even by the time they're of age,
translation.it: Quindi, anche quando sono maggiorenni,

translation.en: the line between tough coaching and child abuse gets blurred.
translation.it: il confine tra il duro allenamento e l'abuso non è più tanto nitido.

translation.en: So then when real, like, obvious abuse, sexual abuse happens,
translation.it: E quando si verificano dei veri e propri abusi, abusi sessuali,

translation.en: you already don't believe your own take on things.
translation.it: già non riesci più a distinguerli.

translation.en: Because you think you're hungry. You think your ankle hurts. [laughs]
translation.it: Perché pensi di avere fame. Che ti faccia male la caviglia.

translation.en: You think that you're working really hard.
translation.it: Sei convinta di impegnarti al massimo.

translation.en: But you're told and you're screamed at that you're lazy and fat
translation.it: E invece ti sgridano perché sei pigra e grassa

translation.en: and there's nothing wrong with your ankle. So when a man...
translation.it: e la tua caviglia sta bene. Quindi, quando un uomo...

translation.en: puts his ungloved hand into your vagina without asking you,
translation.it: infila la mano nella tua vagina senza un guanto e senza chiedertelo,

translation.en: I can only imagine that what you feel is,
translation.it: posso solo immaginare quello che pensi:

translation.en: "He's this great doctor, and I'm lucky to be here. I'm not gonna say anything."
translation.it: "È un grande dottore e sono fortunata a essere qui, non dirò niente."

translation.en: [Nassar] We protect our athletes.
translation.it: Noi proteggiamo le nostre atlete.

translation.en: Not just physically, but mentally...
translation.it: Non solo fisicamente, devi proteggerle...

translation.en: you have to protect your athletes.
translation.it: anche mentalmente.

translation.en: If you screw up once...
translation.it: Se sbagli una volta...

translation.en: if you do something where you break their trust, you're done.
translation.it: Se fai qualcosa che tradisce la loro fiducia, hai finito.

translation.en: Gymnasts first. Gymnasts first.
translation.it: INTERVISTA CON LARRY NASSAR Prima le ginnaste.

translation.en: Gymnasts first.
translation.it: Prima le ginnaste.

translation.en: [Manly] The environment and the culture Bela and Martha Karolyi created at the ranch
translation.it: Nel ranch, Bela e Martha Karolyi crearono un ambiente e una cultura

translation.en: was one of fear...
translation.it: fondati sulla paura...

translation.en: intimidation...
translation.it: l'intimidazione...

translation.en: and silence.
translation.it: e il silenzio.

translation.en: The only bright light at that place was Larry Nassar.
translation.it: L'unica luce in quel posto era Larry Nassar.

translation.en: It's just a bibbidi-bobbidi-boo, I like to call it.
translation.it: È solo un bibbidi-bobbidi-bu, io lo chiamo così.

translation.en: You just go, "Bib, bib, bib, bob, bob, bob, boo, boo, boo."
translation.it: Fai: "Bib, bib, bib, bob, bob, bob, bu, bu, bu."

translation.en: So a little bibbidi-bobbidi-boo.
translation.it: Ecco, bibbidi-bobbidi-bu.

translation.en: There. [pops]
Pop goes the weasel. So this little ball--
translation.it: Pop fa la donnola. Quindi questa pallina...

translation.en: [Manly] He was kind. He was funny.
translation.it: Era gentile, divertente.

translation.en: He made them laugh.
translation.it: Le faceva ridere.

translation.en: That's what I do when I articulate. Okay? And then I thrust--
translation.it: Quando l'articolo, faccio così. Ok? Poi spingo...

translation.en: [Manly] He snuck them snacks and gave them food,
translation.it: Portava loro degli snack, da mangiare,

translation.en: and he engendered trust in all these women.
translation.it: e infondeva fiducia in tutte.

translation.en: Nassar was everything the Karolyis were not.
translation.it: Nassar era tutto ciò che non erano i Karoly.

translation.en: Thank you for visiting GymnasticsDoctor.com,
translation.it: Grazie per aver visitato GymnasticsDoctor.com,

translation.en: where you can see over 400 educational videos
translation.it: dove potete trovare oltre 400 video educativi

translation.en: on how to rehabilitate your gymnast.
translation.it: su come riabilitare la ginnasta.

translation.en: [Manly] To try and justify the methodology that he used,
translation.it: Per cercare di giustificare la metodologia che usava,

translation.en: Larry Nassar produced dozens of videos
translation.it: Larry Nassar produceva decine di video

translation.en: of him doing these various,

translation.en: This is a July 22, 2015 e-mail.

translation.en: So this was after Maggie had reported to USA Gymnastics.
translation.it: Quindi successiva alla denuncia di Maggie alla USA Gymnastics.

translation.en: Records that we reviewed
translation.it: Nelle testimonianze esaminate

translation.en: And it says, "We explained on the call, USA Gymnastics has been made aware
translation.it: Dice: "Al telefono abbiamo spiegato che la USA Gymnastics è venuta a conoscenza di alcune sue pratiche, e che le atlete

translation.it: a meno che non preferisca adottare un approccio diverso di cui possiamo parlare."

translation.en: [woman] Michigan State University and Team USA Gymnastics doctor,

translation.en: Larry Nassar, has been arrested.
translation.it: e della squadra USA, è stato arrestato.

translation.en: Nassar will be charged with three counts of first-degree criminal sexual conduct
translation.it: Nassar sarà accusato di tre reati sessuali di primo grado contro persone di età inferiore ai 13 anni.

translation.en: with someone younger than 13. Attorney General Bill Schuette is...
translation.it: contro persone di età inferiore ai 13 anni. Il procuratore generale Schuette...

translation.en: [Povilaitis] We were looking toward trial, um, and preparing for that.

translation.en: And... and we really looked at what could get the highest sentence for him.

translation.en: In Michigan, we have a statute that, if you have a victim under 13
translation.it: La legge del Michigan prevede che se un minore di 13 anni viene penetrato,

translation.en: and she's penetrated, it's a 25-year mandatory minimum.
translation.it: che se un minore di 13 anni viene penetrato, la sentenza minima è di 25 anni.

translation.it: Quindi abbiamo identificato i casi più forti

translation.en: and brought those in February of 2017.
translation.it: e li abbiamo presentati nel febbraio del 2017.

translation.en: Those victims knew to report because of Rachael's disclosure.

translation.en: She, you know, at that point, was the only public face.

translation.en: because they're giving up so much control by telling someone what happened to them.

translation.it: Ma ognuna delle sopravvissute era molto determinata

translation.en: to make it very clear to everybody...

translation.en: [Povilaitis] Good morning, Your Honor. Angela Povilaitis.
translation.it: Buongiorno, Vostro Onore. Angela Povilaitis.

translation.en: On behalf of the people and the Michigan Department of Attorney General,
translation.it: A nome del popolo e del dipartimento del procuratore generale del Michigan,

translation.en: But we also wanted victim buy-in. Like, we wanted them,

translation.en: all 125, if possible, to be okay with this plea.
translation.it: che tutte e 125 le vittime, se possibile, fossero d'accordo con il patteggiamento.

translation.it: Essenziale in ogni patteggiamento,

translation.it: era che lui doveva permettere a tutte le vittime

translation.en: If I may, our first survivor to speak today, Your Honor,

translation.it: è un ex membro della nazionale, e sono molto felice che sia qui.

translation.en: [judge] Thank you. What would you like us to know?

translation.en: Larry, you saw all the physical, mental, and emotional abuse
translation.it: Larry, hai visto tutti gli abusi fisici, mentali ed emotivi

translation.en: from our coaches and USAG national staff.
translation.it: dei nostri allenatori e dello staff nazionale della USAG.

translation.en: You pretended to be on my side, calling all of them the monsters.
translation.it: Hai finto di essere dalla mia parte, definendoli tutti mostri.

translation.en: But instead of protecting children and reporting the abuse you saw...
translation.it: Ma invece di proteggere le bambine e denunciare gli abusi che vedevi,

translation.en: you used your position of power to manipulate and abuse as well.
translation.it: anche tu hai usato la tua posizione di potere per manipolarci e abusare di noi.

translation.en: You knew I was powerless.
translation.it: Sapevi che ero impotente.

translation.en: I'm here today with all these other women, not victims, but survivors...

translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: [Manly] And who reported that to you, ma'am?
translation.it: E chi glielo disse, signora?

translation.en: Mr. Penny.
translation.it: Il sig. Penny.

translation.en: [Manly] Okay.
translation.it: Ok.

translation.en: Mrs. Karolyi knew, in June of 2015,
translation.it: La signora Karolyi sapeva, nel giugno del 2015,

translation.en: that Larry Nassar had abused little girls.
translation.it: che Larry Nassar aveva molestato delle bambine.

translation.en: The law in Texas required her to immediately call the police
translation.it: La legge del Texas le imponeva di chiamare subito la polizia

translation.en: or call Child Protective Services and report.
translation.it: o i Servizi Sociali per denunciarlo.

translation.en: And she didn't.
translation.it: E non l'ha fatto.

translation.en: Nor did Rhonda Faehn, the head of the women's program, nor did Mr. Penny.
translation.it: Come non lo fecero né Rhonda Faehn né il signor Penny.

translation.en: That deserves an investigation.
translation.it: Questo merita un'indagine.

translation.en: Other questions?
translation.it: Altre domande?

translation.en: USA Gymnastics once wrote to a gymnast
translation.it: Una volta, la USA Gymnastics ha scritto a una ginnasta

translation.en: saying that, if she continued to complain about her coach...
translation.it: che, se avesse continuato a lamentarsi del suo allenatore...

translation.en: she would be off the team,
translation.it: l'avrebbero cacciata dalla squadra,

translation.en: regardless of her performance.
translation.it: a prescindere dalla sua performance.

translation.en: -And that system is still in place today. -[Kwiatkowski] Right.
translation.it: - E quel sistema è in vigore ancora oggi. - Già.

translation.en: [Berta] They're clinging to a process
translation.it: Si aggrappano a un processo

translation.en: that has been used in the past to silence dissent.
translation.it: che in passato è stato usato per mettere a tacere il dissenso.

translation.en: That's what that says.
translation.it: Ecco cosa dice quello.
